inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of primary locally advanced squamous cell carcinoma of the oral cavity, pharynx, nasopharynx or larynx
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: s/p neck mass resection; unable to perform thyroidectomy
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and worsening dysphagia, poor oral intake, weight loss, and lethargy.
